005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractModuleLoader;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModuleLoader;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.XmlModule;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.METASCHEMADocument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException;
019import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlOptions;
020import org.xml.sax.InputSource;
021import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
022import org.xml.sax.XMLReader;
023
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.net.URI;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.stream.Collectors;
029
030import javax.xml.XMLConstants;
031import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
032import javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser;
033import javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory;
034
035import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
036
037/**
038 * Provides methods to load a Metaschema expressed in XML.
039 * <p>
040 * Loaded Metaschema instances are cached to avoid the need to load them for
041 * every use. Any Metaschema imported is also loaded and cached automatically.
042 */
043public class ModuleLoader
044    extends AbstractModuleLoader<METASCHEMADocument, IXmlMetaschemaModule> {
045  private boolean resolveEntities; // = false;
046  @NonNull
047  private final List<IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor> modulePostProcessors;
048
049  /**
050   * Construct a new Metaschema loader, which applies the provided constraints to
051   * loaded modules.
052   *
053   * @param constraints
054   *          a set of Metaschema module constraints to be applied during loading
055   * @return the loader instance configured with the specified constraints
056   */
057  public static ModuleLoader newInstanceUsingConstraints(@NonNull Collection<IConstraintSet> constraints) {
058    return new ModuleLoader(CollectionUtil.singletonList(new ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor(constraints)));
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Construct a new Metaschema loader with no constraints.
063   *
064   * @see #newInstanceUsingConstraints(Collection) for creating an instance with
065   *      constraints
066   */
067  public ModuleLoader() {
068    this(CollectionUtil.<IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor>emptyList());
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Construct a new Metaschema loader, which use the provided module post
073   * processors when loading a module.
074   *
075   * @param modulePostProcessors
076   *          post processors to perform additional module customization when
077   *          loading
078   */
079  public ModuleLoader(@NonNull List<IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor> modulePostProcessors) {
080    this.modulePostProcessors = modulePostProcessors;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Enable a mode that allows XML entity resolution. This may be needed to parse
085   * some resource files that contain entities. Enabling entity resolution is a
086   * less secure, which requires trust in the resource content being parsed.
087   */
088  public void allowEntityResolution() {
089    resolveEntities = true;
090  }
091
092  @Override
093  protected IXmlMetaschemaModule newModule(
094      URI resource,
095      METASCHEMADocument binding,
096      List<? extends IXmlMetaschemaModule> importedModules)
097      throws MetaschemaException {
098    IXmlMetaschemaModule module = new XmlModule(resource, binding, importedModules);
099
100    for (IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor postProcessor : modulePostProcessors) {
101      postProcessor.processModule(module);
102    }
103    return module;
104  }
105
106  @Override
107  protected List<URI> getImports(METASCHEMADocument binding) {
108    return ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getMETASCHEMA().getImportList().stream()
109        .map(imported -> URI.create(imported.getHref()))
110        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
111  }
112
113  /**
114   * Parse the provided XML resource as a Metaschema module.
115   *
116   * @param resource
117   *          the resource to parse
118   * @return the XMLBeans representation of the Metaschema module
119   * @throws IOException
120   *           if a parsing error occurred
121   */
122  @Override
123  protected METASCHEMADocument parseModule(@NonNull URI resource) throws IOException {
124    METASCHEMADocument metaschemaXml;
125    try {
126      XmlOptions options = new XmlOptions();
127      if (resolveEntities) {
128        SAXParserFactory factory = SAXParserFactory.newInstance();
129
130        try {
131          // factory.setFeature(XMLConstants.FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING, true);
132          factory.setFeature("http://apache.org/xml/features/disallow-doctype-decl", false);
133          factory.setFeature("http://xml.org/sax/features/external-general-entities", true);
134          factory.setFeature("http://xml.org/sax/features/external-parameter-entities", true);
135          SAXParser parser = factory.newSAXParser();
136          parser.setProperty(XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_DTD, "file"); // ,jar:file
137          XMLReader reader = parser.getXMLReader();
138          reader.setEntityResolver((publicId, systemId) -> null);
139          options.setLoadUseXMLReader(reader);
140        } catch (SAXException | ParserConfigurationException ex) {
141          throw new IOException(ex);
142        }
143        // options.setLoadEntityBytesLimit(204800);
144        // options.setLoadUseDefaultResolver();
145        options.setEntityResolver((publicId, systemId) -> {
146          String effectiveSystemId = systemId;
147          // TODO: It's very odd that the system id looks like this. Need to investigate.
148          if (effectiveSystemId.startsWith("file://file://")) {
149            effectiveSystemId = effectiveSystemId.substring(14);
150          }
151          URI resolvedSystemId = resource.resolve(effectiveSystemId);
152          return new InputSource(resolvedSystemId.toString());
153        });
154        options.setLoadDTDGrammar(true);
155      }
156      options.setBaseURI(resource);
157      options.setLoadLineNumbers();
158      metaschemaXml = ObjectUtils.notNull(METASCHEMADocument.Factory.parse(resource.toURL(), options));
159    } catch (XmlException ex) {
160      throw new IOException(ex);
161    }
162    return metaschemaXml;
163  }
164
165}
